rajge piya nawa rakiyawak soya engalanthayata yamata thiranaya karana athara me hethuwen rajta siya yahaluwan dedenagen ath wimata sidu we.me nisa widyuth thapala haraha lipi huwamaru kara ganimata raj wisin tinawa porondu kara gani.thamage anekuth wada katayuthu walata wadi awadhanayak yomu karana tina rajta lipi liwima maga harina athara eya thamage lengathu mithuriya wana pujata bara karayi.pakshapathi yeheliyaka wu puja ema rajakariya itha kamaththen bara ganna athara tinage poronduwa raka ganimin, tina namin rajta lipi liyayi.atham awasthawala nodanuwathwama tinage nama wenuwata thama nama lipi walata yodana puja thama athapasuwima wahama wataha ganna athara eya nawatha niwaradi kara tina namin raj samaga siya sithum pathum huwamaru kara gani.raj saha pujage sithum pathum boho durata samana wana athara me hethuwen lipi magin thawa duratath owun dedena ekinekata itha samipa we.me athara wasara pahalowakata pasu niwaduwak gatha kirima sadaha raj nawathath indiyawata pamine.danatamath ohuge sithehi lipi liyanniya pilibada aadarayak athi athara palamu dasuninma thamanta ayawa haduna ganimata haki bawa wishwasa karayi.
